text: The Grammys return to New York this Sunday for the first time in 15 years and feature performances from nominees Kendrick Lamar, Bruno Mars, Kesha, Pink, and many more. The 60th Grammy Awards will be broadcast live from Madison Square Garden at 4 : 30 p. m. PT / 7 : 30 p. m. ET on CBS. “ The Late Late Show ” host James Corden returns to emcee the ceremony for a second year. Cord - cutters can tune into the show using CBS All Access, which allows for a seven - day free trial.
